title: Army Approves Dakota Access Pipeline - Fox Nation

organizations.name: army approves dakota access pipeline - fox nation army

text:
Army Approves Dakota Access Pipeline Published February 7, 2017 AP 
By Ed Crooks | Financial Times 
The US Army Corps of Engineers has formally filed notice with a federal court in Washington that it wants to award a crucial permit needed for the controversial Dakota Access oil pipeline to be completed. 
In a filing in the DC district court on Tuesday afternoon, the Corps said that it planned to issue the permit, known as an “easement”, following an order given by President Donald Trump last month.
